publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3647 Pauline McNeill: Supermarket Packaging—That the Parliament notes the Friends of the Earth Scotland’s national waste-prevention project and that local volunteer waste-prevention champions will be carrying out a packaging take-back protest at their local Morrison’s store in Partick on Saturday 14 March 2009; further notes that food packaging costs households £470 per year, which is one sixth of the average food budget, and that over 40% of household rubbish that goes into landfill is supermarket packaging, and calls on supermarkets, which control 80% of the grocery market spend, to use their purchasing influence to reduce excessive packaging and also to continue to work to reduce the number of plastic carrier bags distributed to shoppers. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Jackie Baillie*, Bob Doris*, Patricia Ferguson*, Patrick Harvie*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-3647 Supermarket Packaging (lodged on 9 March 2009) Malcolm Chisholm*, Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Pringle*, Elaine Murray*, Trish Godman*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-3647 Supermarket Packaging (lodged on 9 March 2009) Jamie Stone*, Jim Hume*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Ken Macintosh*, Cathie Craigie*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*

S3M-3647 Pauline McNeill: Supermarket Packaging—That the Parliament notes the Friends of the Earth Scotland’s national waste-prevention project and that local volunteer waste-prevention champions will be carrying out a packaging take-back protest at their local Morrison’s store in Partick on Saturday 14 March 2009; further notes that food packaging costs households £470 per year, which is one sixth of the average food budget, and that over 40% of household rubbish that goes into landfill is supermarket packaging, and calls on supermarkets, which control 80% of the grocery market spend, to use their purchasing influence to reduce excessive packaging and also to continue to work to reduce the number of plastic carrier bags distributed to shoppers. Supported by: Bill Kidd, Jackie Baillie, Bob Doris, Patricia Ferguson, Patrick Harvie, Kenneth Gibson, Malcolm Chisholm, Jamie Hepburn, Mike Pringle, Elaine Murray, Trish Godman, Mary Mulligan, Jamie Stone, Jim Hume, Hugh O’Donnell, Ken Macintosh, Cathie Craigie, Robin Harper, Hugh Henry, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Jack McConnell*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-3647 Supermarket Packaging (lodged on 9 March 2009) Christine Grahame*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-3647 Supermarket Packaging (lodged on 9 March 2009) Christopher Harvie*
S3M-3647 Supermarket Packaging (lodged on 9 March 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3647 Supermarket Packaging (lodged on 9 March 2009) Tom McCabe*, Rhoda Grant*, Nicol Stephen*
S3M-3647 Supermarket Packaging (lodged on 9 March 2009) Robert Brown*
S3M-3647 Supermarket Packaging (lodged on 9 March 2009) Dave Thompson*
